Description:
What is new in version 11.0.0 build 3026

- Supports NewBlue Video Essentials V and VI effect packs.
- Improves scene detection accuracy.
- Resolves program crash at aticaldd.dll module when creating Blu-ray discs with hardware encoding on some AMD graphics card platforms.
- Resolves green screen or broken image issue in output video when using hardware decoding.
- Resolves green screen or broken image issue in output HDV or AVCHD video when using SVRT with NVIDIA or AMD graphics card.
- Resolves eCOOC0005 error when burning to Blu-ray disc or SD card with menus.
- Resolves error in the time property of library videos caused by daylight savings.
- Resolves a malfunction when applying user-defined Magic Motion to all clips in build 2707.
- Resolves "Encountered an improper argument" error when creating title templates with "Scroll up" animation effect in build 2707.
